name: B2Xe - Binary to Xml Conversion tool
short_description: A cross platform binary (database) to xml conversion tool written in java language. Uses the well accepted XML structured template files for the conversion definitions. Easy-to-use features supported with java GUI for advanced users as well as beginners.
